thread.section_title: Ancestry.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ancestry.com | www.ancestry.com
thread.title: George Barbagallo

author: George Barbagallo
title: George Barbagallo
text: Not very good service here, same reply when I ask about when I will get my report, grade D-minus we called these people and after over one month, it has not been processed yet!! We asked for our money back and they wanted half of what we paid for. It also took 13 days from when we mailed the test kit in till they noted they received it, look elsewhere people this is a scam.
